## UIObject.startFollow() method

指定物体开始跟随摄像机或射线

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startFollow( type : UIFollowType, relatedPos : Vector3f, relatedRotate : Vector3f) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [UIFollowType](./extractor.uifollowtype.md) | 跟随类型 |
|  relatedPos | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 相对跟随目标的位置,可为NULL |
|  relatedRotate | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 相对跟随目标的旋转欧拉角,可为NULL |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
